issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When using KitchenSink-Nook (sequentially from "Base UI > Views > Table Views > Delete Row" to "Platform > Database"), in the Database test, after pressing "DB in 2nd Context", then backing out of the app and redeploying, the app crashed on restart. Unable to reproduce.

Steps to Reproduce.

1. Run KitchenSink-Nook tests sequentially from "Base UI > Views > Table Views > Delete Row" to "Platform > Database".
2. In Database, click "DB in 2nd Context".
3. Press back repeatedly (at a normal pace) until app is closed.
4. Click on the app in the phone app browser to start it.

Expected Result:

App should load.

Actual Result:

Crash.
fields.summary: Android: KitchenSink-Nook: SIGSEGV crash on app restart after using database
fields.environment:
SDK: 2.0.1.v20120407201726
Android: V8
Studio: 2.0.1.201204061639
OS: Snow Leopard
Devices Tested: Kindle Fire 6.3

comments.body:
After Base UI > Views > Table Views  It shows "Run time error" on my device.When tap on some of the tabs it shows same error in kitchensink nook.

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.2.201302191606
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
Device: Samsung galaxy s duos Android version: 4.0.4
Android Emulator: Android SDK version: 2.2
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
